Joe's Bar in Llano Texas Hold 'Em, Ladies Night & Karaoke Night

Joe’s Bar in Llano

No buy-in! $15 prize for 1st place, $10 for second. 22 spots ONLY- seats are first-come, first-filled! Come play some cards with us in the back room at Joe's on Wednesdays!

$3 OFF for ALL drinks for the ladies, from 6pm to close!

It is also Karaoke Night (7pm - 10pm)! So grab your girlfriends and come make Wednesday YOUR night!

Wednesdays mean it's Karaoke Night at Joe's!

Come sing your heart out!!

Wednesdays are also Ladies Night - with $3 OFF all drinks for ladies from 6pm to close!

Joe's Bar in Llano Music Bingo & Pool Tournament

Joe’s Bar in Llano

Recognize the song? Fill in the box!

Finish a row - you've got BINGO! Get two rows - Win a Prize!

That's it, that's how you play music bingo!

Come on out and play for FREE to win gift cards & other prizes!

$5 Buy-in and prizes for 1st and 2nd place!

Joe's Bar will be kicking in $100 for the prize pool!

Space limited. Slots allotted on a first-come, first-served basis.

The Enloe Boys LIVE at Joe's Bar in Llano

Joe’s Bar in Llano

The Enloe Boys are a father/son acoustic duo from Kerrville playing everything from Johnny Cash to the Red Hot Chili Peppers.

Tanner (son) is a paralegal who plays lead & rhythm guitar, electric & stand-up bass, and also sings.

Frankie (dad) is a retired heavy equipment operator and has been a part time pastor at Turtle Creek Church for 25 years, he plays rhythm as well as sings.

Together they’re a recent, but incredible addition to our weekend music lineup.

Deadpool & Wolverine Movie at the Lantex Theater

Come join us for Deadpool & Wolverine this weekend, August 30th & 31st. Doors open at 6:30 and the movie starts at 7:30pm. This is a rated R movie parents, please be mindful & if you are going to allow your children to watch this movie we request you accompany them to the theater. We will check ID’s. Hope to see y’all there!

Matt Hilton & Joe Forlini at Joe's Bar in Llano

Joe’s Bar in Llano

Matt Hilton, of the Llano Station Band, is coming to our stage with his friend Joe Forlini for another epic show!

Local Singer/Songwriter Matt Hilton shares the stage with legendary guitarist Joe Forlini for a fun evening of rock, country and original music.

Joe has spent a lifelong career as a professional musician playing for the likes of Texas legends; Jerry Jeff Walker, Gary P Nunn, Joe Ely, Auggie Meyers and Larry Joe Taylor to name a few.

Combined, these native mid-westerner's - now Llano residents - bring an interesting touch to many of the classics that will have you dancing and singing along!

View Event →

Llano Art Guild Hands on Demo

Llano Art Gallery

503 Bessemer, Llano, Texas

POINTILLISM

Art Talk/Demo/ Hands-on

Tuesday, September 3, 2024

10 am to Noon

Pot lunch afterwards

Followed by Llano Art Guild Monthly Meeting

Rebecca (Becky) Lindgren will present our art demonstration on Tuesday, September 3 from 10 to 12:00pm- She is one of the Guild's artists specializing in 2 D art such as watercolor, acrylic & collage painting. She has an art major but spent her career working with injured workers. The class will consist of a bit of art history, information about Pointilism and how it originated and grew, as well as, each participant will experiment with the concept and complete a painting. Llano Fine Art Guild & Gallery

Join us on September 5th at The Pink Cactus for the Llano Chamber of Commerce Business After Hours and Ribbon Cutting event. The Pink Cactus has relocated to 407 East Young St in Llano, and everyone is welcome to attend. It's a fantastic opportunity to socialize, network with fellow business owners, and explore the new location while enjoying refreshments and snacks.

Tyler Cannon at Joe's Bar in Llano

Joe’s Bar in Llano

Growing up in the coastal Texas town of Kingsville, Tyler Cannon soaked up the influence of his parents’ diverse record collection for as long as he could remember, everything from dancehall-friendly classic country to platinum-selling rockers like The Eagles and the Steve Miller Band to the pop-punk and hard rock he picked up on once he was old enough to seek out his own records. This developed into his own style of punchy, melodic shot of guitar-driven rock & roll and plainspoken Texas country.

Tyler Cannon LIVE at Joe's Bar in Llano

Compete against other teams to put together a 500-piece puzzle!

The first 2 teams to finish will be awarded a prize.

Sterling Creek Builders Presents Speaker Thomas Blackwell - " Change Your Language, Change Your Life"

Come join us at the Llano High School Auditorium for an inspiring evening with the renowned speaker, Thomas Blackwell. Get ready to be motivated, entertained, and enlightened as Thomas shares his wisdom and experiences with us. This in-person event promises to be a night to remember, so mark your calendars and invite your friends for an unforgettable experience!

This inspirational, 'Change Your Language, Change Your Life' workshop will show you:

How to eliminate fear, anxiety & worry from daily vocabulary

How to operate in a daily state of gratitude & appreciation

How to attract what we do want and eliminate what we don't want

Thomas Blackwell is the CEO and Founder of Say Do Achieve, whose vision is to significantly improve the language and mindset of more than one billion people worldwide through authorship, inspirational talks and workshops, and peak performance coaching. Thomas's latest best-selling book, "The Liberty of our Language Revealed, We Bring About What We Talk About", inspires people to change their language in order to change their results. He has given more than 1000 talks and workshops worldwide to corporations, entrepreneurs, sales teams, athletes, religious groups, and students.

LEARN MORE ABOUT OUR KEYNOTE SPEAKER

WWW.THOMASBLACKWELLSPEAKS.COM

Hayden Baker LIVE @ LTX

LTX Mercantile

Hayden became the first artist/writer signed to Ronnie Dunn's publishing company, Perfect Pitch.

HB's newest album, Barely Gettin’ By, features some of his strongest work to date, offering a 14-song punch that features collaborations with Adam and Wade Hill, and impressively (and unbelievably to Baker), his hero and friend, Brad Paisley.

Movie in the Vines at Fiesta Winery - Free Event

The results are in - the majority winner for our Fall Movie in the Vines will feature everyone's favorite, Grease!

Doors open at 6:30 PM, with the film beginning after sunset (approximately 7:45 PM). This is a free event, so bring the family out, sit back, relax, and enjoy dinner from the Bistro with a few added surprises!

Blankets and lawn chairs are encouraged!

Members, we've reserved the rock patio for optimal viewing just for you.

Come dressed to impress in 50's attire to be entered to win a Fiesta gift basket. Winner will be drawn before the movie!

Llano Heritage Day Oct 18-20, 2024

Friday-Sunday October 18, 19, 20,2024

Celebrate Llano’s history as we present Llano Heritage Days for the Texas Hill Country. Llano Heritage Days is a family friendly event hosted by the Llano Historical Society of the Llano Historical Museum where the Llano community and visitors from near and far come to see and experience living history in historic downtown Llano! This year it will be a three-day event with the potential to bring 700-1000 people to town.

The Society is planning a Chuck Wagon meal and entertainment on Friday evening, an all-day festival on Saturday and on Sunday, a living history tour of the Llano Cemetery with re-enactors at specific gravesites of Llano pioneers. If you or your group or orginzation want to be one of the entertainer, please fill out the application below.

Llano Heritage Days provides a special opportunity for the Llano area businesses, organizations, and individuals to partner with the Llano County Historical Museum to bring free and accessible entertainment and activities for all ages.

We hope you will consider partnering with us to make Llano Heritage Days the best event in the Texas Hill Country. We offer several sponsorship opportunities and hope that you will consider one listed in the enclosed information.

For more information contact Virginia Walker or Mike Reagor at the Llano Museum 325-247-3026

Thank you for your support,

Llano County Historical Society

Llano Heritage Day

Sponsor Agreement

Entertainer Application

Save the Date - Wings Wheels & Wine

Save the Date - Buy Tickets Here

Come join us for a day filled with fun at the Llano Municipal Airport! Get ready for a fantastic event featuring everything from vintage planes to classic cars. We'll have a Provost Jet, a high-energy Pitts act, a Classical Christen Eagle act, a WWII Trainer T-6 act, another high energy Chinese Nanchang CJ-6 act, and a water-drop by an AT-802 Air Tractor front and center of the crowd! How about a living history demonstration that includes WWII weapons demonstration? Yup - we have that too. Sip on some delicious wine by 7 Creeks Vineyard while you stroll around and enjoy the sights that will not only include some of the Lake Area Rods & Classic cars, but also some of the world's most fascinating airplanes on display. Bring the kids - we'll have a KID ZONE! This is an in-person event that you won't want to miss! Mark your calendars now for an unforgettable experience at Wings, Wheels & Wine 2024.

325.247.5635

Llano River Chuck Wagon Cook-Off Weekend - Tickets Go On Sale

Llano River Chuck Wagon tickets go on sale!! Call us at the Llano Visitor Center and Chamber of Commerce 325-247-5354 We are excited to announce, Llano River Chuck Wagon Cook-off.

Badu Park

Llano, Texas

Stay Tuned for 2025!

Tickets go on sale at 9:00 AM, Monday, February 10, 2025 at the Llano Chamber of Commerce. For your convenience, call to charge your tickets & pick up at the Cook-Off between 10:30 and 11:00 AM! 325-247-5354

Due to the upcoming Total Eclipse happening on April 8, 2024 the Llano River Chuck Wagon date has changed for the 2024 year. The new date will be:

Thursday,

Noon – Wagons arrive and set up

Friday,

Morning – Wagons must be set up

Noon – Wagon Authenticity Judging (can begin earlier if wagon is ready)

Afternoon – Continue Authenticity Judging

Afternoon – Cook Teams receive food supplies

6:00 pm – Host Wagon Dinner for Wagon Teams, Sponsors, VIP’s and invited guests only

Saturday,

The competing teams begin preparing some of the tastiest chuck wagon fare imaginable!

10:00 am – 3:00 pm – Live music

Noon – Food is sent to the judges

Noon – Public meal is served

3:00 pm – Announcement of Results
